item.title: Judicialización de la política
item.description: La judicialización de la política es: “the expansion of the province of the courts or the judges at the expense of the politicians … the transfer of decision making rights from the legislature, the cabinet, or the civil service to the courts” 1. Colombia DeJusticia et. al. dice que todo el sistema impositivo es inconstitucional. Vallinder, T., «The judicialization of politics. A world-wide phenomenon: Introduction», International Political Science Review/Revue internationale de science politique, 1994, págs.
